cp.utils¶

Utils module contains various utility functions that are used in different parts of the conformal prediction library.

cp.utils.get_instance(data, i)[source]¶

Extract a single instance from data as a test instance and return the remainder as a training set.

cp.utils.split_data(data, a, b)[source]¶

“Split data in approximate ratio a:b.

cp.utils.shuffle_data(data)[source]¶

Randomly shuffle data instances.
